EmailTemplate.description: PD Day Follow Up Email LA
EmailTemplate.name: PD Day - LA -9-2007 follow up
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for attending American Student Assistance's Louisiana Professional Development Day on September 14, 2007.
It was a pleasure to see so many friendly faces.
I look forward to seeing you at the conference in Shreveport next month. To attend another great ASA training, check your conference program for the ASA session "Go With the Flows: Optimizing Your Loan Processing."
Thanks, Steve
Steve Greenough Regional Account Executive American Student Assistance 800-999-9080 Ext. 4693 sgreenough@amsa.com www.amsa.com
